extensionDescription.message: BookMark, sync your bookmarks across different browsers

confirm_download.message: Confirm to download and replace all local bookmarks?

confirm_clear.message: Confirm to clear all bookmarks in your local browser?

uploadBookmarks.description: Upload all bookmarks from your local browser to the server

downloadBookmarks.description: First clear the bookmarks in your local browser, then download all the bookmarks from the server to your local browser

syncBookmarks.description: Merge all bookmarks from the server into your local browser, then upload them to the server

uploadBookmarksDesc.message: Upload all bookmarks from your local browser to the server

downloadBookmarksDesc.message: First clear all bookmarks in your local browser, then download all bookmarks from the server to your local browser

syncBookmarksDesc.message: Merge all bookmarks from the server into your local browser, then upload them to the server

removeAllBookmarksDesc.message: Clear all bookmarks in your local browser; please back them up first
